Title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez (executive story editor), Paul Dichter (staff writer), Kate Trefry (staff writer)
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: Eleven makes plans to finish what she started while the survivors turn up the heat on the monstrous force that's holding Will hostage.
